column2: Refuse Quests to change your Focus

Refuse to receive quests to change your Focus to an approved one. These quests are trivial to complete and can be a useful way to gain society influence quickly - but if you don't want to change your focus, being repeatedly asked to do so can be annoying.
Accept Quests to change your Focus

Allow yourself to receive quests to change your Focus to an approved one. These quests are trivial to complete and can be a useful way to gain society influence quickly - but if you don't want to change your focus, being repeatedly asked to do so can be annoying.
